series_description: This series documents the write-off of debts for accounts in which the agency was unable to collect payments. This series may include, but is not limited to: spreadsheets, reports, and final write-off documentation.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the creation and finalization of the budget for the Housing Choice Voucher Program. This series may include, but is not limited to: spreadsheets, presentations, and working papers.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the review and audit of contracting agencies that administer the agency's voucher program. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit findings and correspondence.

This series documents a family's eligibility to participate in the Housing Choice Voucher Program (HCVP). This series may include, but is not limited to: approved and denied Request for Tenancy Approvals, notices for expired or terminated vouchers, and case notes.

This series documents the determination of funding that would be needed to administer the Voucher program. This series include, but is not limited to: Annual Contributions Contract (ACC) list, worksheets, memos, contract revisions, financial statements, funding increment letters, and HUD correspondence.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents monies owed to vendors. This series may include, but is not limited to: bills, invoices, and utility, administrative fee, housing assistance, and special payments.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents the approval of properties for the Moderate Rehabilitation rental assistance program. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, personal and financial information, approvals, and supporting
legal_citation: 24CFR 882 subpart D and E. 24CFR882 subpart D and E

series_description: This series documents applications that were approved for families to receive rental assistance per a housing assistance payment contract as a participant in the voucher program. series may include, but is not limited to: applications, leases , inspection and income verification reports, and rent reasonableness certifications.

This series documents monies owed to the voucher program other public housing authorities after a family relocates and ports into the agency's voucher program. This series may include, but is not limited to: portable notices, payments, and reimbursements.

This series documents monies owed to other public housing authorities for families that leave the agency's voucher and relocates into another public housing authority service This series may include, but is not limited to: portable notices, payments, and reports.
This series documents the receipt, transfer, and expenditure of funds within the Housing Choice Voucher Program (HCVP). This series may include, but is not limited to: ledgers.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_description: This series documents annual and five-year plans that are submitted by public housing authorities to the Department of Housing and Urban Development(HUD). This series may include, but is not limited to: certifications, notices, and correspondence

This series documents the required submission of Section 8 Management Assessment Program (SEMAP) certifications by public housing authorities to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD). This series may include, but is limited to: certifications, appeals, notifications, corrective plans, and correspondence

This series documents the submission of utility allowance schedules from public housing authorities to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD). This series may include, but is not limited to: worksheets

This series documents financial transactions within the program. This series may include, but is not limited to: bank statements, cancelled checks, stop payments, cash reports, bank account reconciliations.
retention_statement: 7 Years after end of state fiscal year
